metadata.summary: Configure adapter to consume messages from AWS SQS queues with customizable polling and processing settings
metadata.primary_use_case: Ingest real-time event streams from SQS message queues into LimaCharlie for security monitoring

extracted_apis.description: Configure SQS adapter with queue_url, aws_access_key_id, aws_secret_access_key, aws_region, and optional max_messages, wait_time_seconds, visibility_timeout, delete_after_processing parameters

cross_refs.description: CloudTrail adapter uses SQS as one collection method
GuardDuty adapter uses SQS as one collection method
